UNSUBSCRIBE

Subscription renewal date

29 January 2025

The subscription can be canceled at any time.

After canceling the subscription, the bike rental will end at the conclusion of the current paid period.
The cancellation must be made at least 3 days before the next billing date to avoid charges for the following month
